titles.title: A joint resolution to designate October 14, 1988, as "National Day of Remembrance for Political Prisoners in Iran".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 9/28/1988--Introduced. Designates October 14, 1988, as National Day of Remembrance for Political Prisoners in Iran.
